INTRO(1) General Commands Manual INTRO(1)

NAME

intro — introduction to honk documentation

DESCRIPTION

Honk processes federated status updates and other microblog activities. This is the index for the honk manual.

honk(1)
User manual.
honk(8)
Administration manual.
honk(5)
Honk composition.
hfcs(1)
Honk Filtering and Censorship System.
activitypub(7)
ActivityPub implementation notes.
honk(3)
API access for robotrons.
vim(3)
Modifying honk.

HISTORY

Started March 2019.

AUTHORS

Ted Unangst @tedu@honk.tedunangst.com
